alexcrichton commented on issue #3648:

I've pushed up release notes for this release and they're pretty modest for this release. Any objections to merging this today though?

cfallin commented on issue #3648:

Releasing today sounds good to me! Modest list but having SIMD on by default in a release is a not-trivial thing!
